headline: Sweet Justice, 25 Years Too Late, for Man Who Served Full Sentence
abstract: Rafael Ruiz always maintained he did not take part in a gang rape in 1984.
lead_paragraph: Four times, Rafael Ruiz recalled, he rejected offers from New York prosecutors to enter a guilty plea and admit to participating in a gang rape on a Harlem rooftop in 1984, even though it would have meant serving much less time. He was under arrest but he had good reason for turning down the deals.
